processingResourceMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.jwpl.WikipediaArticleReader
processingResourceMetaData.description:
Reads all article pages.
A parameter controls whether the full article or only the first paragraph is set as the document text.
No Redirects, disambiguation pages, or discussion pages are regarded, however.

configurationParameter.name: OnlyFirstParagraph
configurationParameter.description: If set to true, only the first paragraph instead of the whole article is used.

configurationParameter.name: OutputPlainText
configurationParameter.description: Whether the reader outputs plain text or wiki markup.

configurationParameter.name: PageBuffer
configurationParameter.description: The page buffer size (#pages) of the page iterator.

configurationParameter.name: PageIdsFromFile
configurationParameter.description: Defines the path to a file containing a line-separated list of page ids of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: PageTitleFromFile
configurationParameter.description: Defines the path to a file containing a line-separated list of page titles of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: PageIdFromArray
configurationParameter.description: Defines an array of page ids of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: PageTitlesFromArray
configurationParameter.description: Defines an array of page titles of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: User
configurationParameter.description: The username of the database account.

configurationParameter.name: Password
configurationParameter.description: The password of the database account.

configurationParameter.name: Language
configurationParameter.description: The language of the Wikipedia that should be connected to.

configurationParameter.name: CreateDBAnno
configurationParameter.description: Sets whether the database configuration should be stored in the CAS, so that annotators down the pipeline can access additional data.
